keyMoments.title: Venom Demon: Jigoku no Shinpan Unleashed
keyMoments.description: Magellan transforms himself with crimson-red poison and unleashes his ultimate forbidden technique, creating a massive devil-like entity made of extremely toxic poison.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the true terrifying capabilities of the Doku Doku no Mi and Magellan's ultimate power as Warden of Impel Down.

keyMoments.title: Failure to Stop the Mass Breakout
keyMoments.description: Despite unleashing his ultimate technique, Magellan arrives at the prison entrance seconds too late to prevent Luffy and the prisoners from escaping.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the first and only failure in Impel Down's history, leading to Magellan's eventual demotion from Chief Warden to Vice Warden.

abilities.description: Magellan's ultimate forbidden technique where he creates a massive devil-like entity made of crimson-red poison so toxic it can destroy anything, even Mr. 3's wax. The poison spreads like a disease through everything it touches.

reveals.information: Possesses a forbidden ultimate technique called Venom Demon that can destroy all of Impel Down

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Ivankov's Partial Recovery
keyMoments.description: Despite being severely weakened from healing Luffy's poison, Ivankov partially recovers using his Horu Horu no Mi abilities and bursts through the ground ready to assist.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the self-healing capabilities of the Horu Horu no Mi and sets up Ivankov's crucial role in the escape.

keyMoments.title: Hell Wink Escape Launch
keyMoments.description: Ivankov enlarges his head and uses Hell Wink to propel all the prisoners out through the entrance of Impel Down and over the ocean.
keyMoments.significance: The Hell Wink becomes the key technique that makes the prison break successful, allowing dozens to escape the inescapable Impel Down.
keyMoments.quote: Everyone, grab onto my face! Hell Wink!

abilities.description: A powerful wink that creates a massive shockwave. In this episode, Ivankov uses it to launch dozens of prisoners through the air and out of Impel Down.
Ivankov uses his hormone powers to partially heal himself from severe exhaustion and injury.

keyMoments.title: Champion Gatling Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Champion Gatling while wearing wax armor created by Galdino, allowing him to attack Magellan without being poisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates tactical cooperation with former enemy Galdino and shows Luffy's adaptability in combat.

keyMoments.title: Strategic Retreat from Magellan
keyMoments.description: Recognizing the impossibility of defeating Venom Demon, Luffy orders a full retreat rather than fighting to the death.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's tactical maturity - he prioritizes the mission to save Ace over his pride, understanding when retreat is necessary.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Leads Mass Breakout
keyMoments.description: Luffy successfully leads the first and only mass breakout in Impel Down's history, escaping with hundreds of prisoners.
keyMoments.significance: Accomplishes the impossible escape from Impel Down, moving one step closer to saving Ace at Marineford.

abilities.description: A combination attack where Luffy's arms are coated in Galdino's wax, allowing him to use Gatling attacks against poison without being contaminated.
A combination attack where Luffy uses a Stamp attack with wax coating, though it proves ineffective against Magellan's stronger poison.

reveals.information: Demonstrates tactical maturity by recognizing when to retreat rather than fight

keyMoments.title: Secures Marine Vessel
keyMoments.description: Jinbe, along with Crocodile and Daz Bonez, successfully secures a Marine battleship for the escape.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the critical getaway vessel needed for the mass prison break.

keyMoments.title: Summons Whale Sharks
keyMoments.description: Jinbe summons a school of whale sharks into the Calm Belt to carry the escaping prisoners from Impel Down to the Marine ship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's incredible mastery over sea creatures as a Fish-Man, proving essential to completing the escape.

abilities.description: Jinbe's ability to communicate with and summon whale sharks and other sea creatures, even in the dangerous Calm Belt.

reveals.information: Can summon and command whale sharks in the Calm Belt

keyMoments.title: Wax Armor Collaboration
keyMoments.description: Galdino creates wax armor for Luffy, allowing him to fight Magellan without being poisoned. He also maintains and removes the wax as needed during combat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Galdino's tactical abilities and willingness to cooperate with Luffy despite their past as enemies.

keyMoments.title: Wax Armor Limitations
keyMoments.description: Galdino's wax begins to melt under Magellan's more potent poison, revealing the limits of his Doru Doru no Mi against extremely powerful toxins.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes that even Galdino's hardened wax has limitations, foreshadowing Magellan's ultimate technique.

reveals.information: His wax can be melted by Magellan's strongest poisons
